name: Mia Workmann
description:
I love dancing and going to fun places with friends who enjoy and appreciate the zest for life. I am an avid sports fan, and love going to the games!I enjoy quiet evenings with that special someone, in the pool or jacuzzi, with candles and wine.
I am gentle and easy going person, i do like to read and like holding hands when walking with my right one..
I am looking for Someone who likes the idea of being a good partner, friend and lover. Two people who care and enjoy each other, and want to create a happy life together. someone who will grow old with me.
